alert.note: Alert for Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:19AM CDT until August 12 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR LINCOLN AND WARREN COUNTIES... At 417 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hardin to near St. Paul to near Innsbrook, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 403 PM, news media reported downed trees in Troy Missouri. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Troy, Warrenton, Wright City, Elsberry, Moscow Mills, Winfield, Davis, Marthasville, Jonesburg, Truesdale, Hawk Point, Innsbrook, Fountain N` Lakes, Chain of Rocks, Dutzow, Flint Hill, Foristell, Old Monroe, Silex, and Foley. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 188 and 200. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
